original_text: And he shall bring them unto the priest, who shall offer that which is for the sin offering first, and wring off his head from his neck, but shall not divide it asunder:
korean_text: 제사장에게로 가져갈 것이요 제사장은 그 속죄제물을 먼저 드리되 그 머리를 목에서 비틀어 끊고 몸은 아주 쪼개지 말며

sentences.original_text: And he shall bring them unto the priest
who shall offer that which is for the sin offering first
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 속죄 제물을 먼저 드릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and wring off his head from his neck
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 목에서 머리를 비틀어 떼어낼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: but shall not divide it asunder:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그것을 찢어 나누지는 않을 것입니다
